text: Lovely little minimart that is well stocked and has almost everything you need in terms of dry foodstuffs. Love to buy can drinks here, as can mix and match. Things are slightly cheaper and worth to shout out is the soju particularly, very affordable. Owners are very nice and friendly, always greet each other and are super helpful.
lovely staff with groceries selling at a very affordable price compared to other minimart/supermarket! been coming to this store since i was a kid, super nostalgic place for me :)
Best minimart in SG. Have been visiting them since iecon days.

Normally this store closes on every Monday. Friendly cashiers who would often say "thank you" to the customers after they had paid. Many cheap snacks/titbits and beverages placed outside the store too.
Amazing staff and great quality goods at low prices!
